H0.text: who painted the ceiling of the florence cathedral. Michelangelo

H1.text: who painted the ceiling of the florence cathedral. Sandro Botticelli

H2.text: who painted the ceiling of the florence cathedral. Domenico Ghirlandaio

H3.text: who painted the ceiling of the florence cathedral. Giorgio Vasari

A4.text: His last major commission was a vast The Last Judgement fresco on the ceiling of the cupola of the Florence Cathedral that he began in 1572 with the assistance of the Bolognese painter Lorenzo Sabatini.

A5.text: Unfinished at the time of Vasari's death, it was completed by Federico Zuccari.

A6.text: This enormous work, 3,600 metresÂ² (38 750 square metres) was started in 1572 by Giorgio Vasari and would not be completed until 1579.
